about_the_game:
Pack Content
This pack includes items that will help your characters grow stronger and aid you in battle.

• Stronghold V Sigil
• Gold Spellbook x 10
• Ambrosia x 5
• Glittercrystal Cluster x 10
• Gold Dalia Badge x 25

The full game is required to use this content. You may also need to update the game to the newest version.

The pack can only be purchased once per account. The sigil comes fully upgraded to T. Lvl 15.

Downloaded content can be obtained by visiting the Knickknack Shack in game and selecting Claim Add-Ons.
